21063388_2,s2,T7,T8,"Here, we show that two regions of ",GW182, proteins interact with ,PABPC1,: the first contains a PABP-interacting motif 2 (PAM2; as shown before for TNRC6C) and the second contains the M2 and C-terminal sequences in the SD.,Complex_formation

21063388_2,s7,T15,T16,"Our findings reveal that despite species-specific differences in the relative strength of the PABPC1-binding sites, the interaction between ",GW182, proteins and ,PABPC1," is critical for miRNA-mediated silencing in animal cells.
